Author: chrsitcoins
Title: [ANN] Christ Coins ICO is LIVE! Join the Movement!
Body: https://christcoins.io/  Hello Bitcointalk world! I am a founding member of Christ Coin, and I greatly appreciate this opportunity to explain our token; I'm looking forward to having you guys join us in our quest to make this world a better place. Any feedback is welcome, and additional information (whitepaper, video) can be found in the link above - thanks for the consideration!  Here are a few things we hope to achieve with this token: Leverage the advantages of blockchain technology (decentralization, transparency, etc.) as a solution to many of the criticisms that religion and churches face every day. Cultivate a Christian community, and provide said community with an easy way to earn tokens that can be used to fund various forms humanitarian outreach on a global scale. Establish a value system with Christ Coin that will mutually benefit the impoverished around the world as well as users of the token, regardless of personal belief or motive for using the token. Charitable nature and the willingness to help those in need are characteristics present in many (if not most) human beings around the world, and can be a powerful force for positive change. Christ Coin is a great way to harness this potential - Help us make an impact on this world!
